rooms.description: A welcoming entry with open space that leads to the central courtyard and garage access. Incorporates local Kerala motifs in finishes.
Two-car garage with secure parking and storage area located adjacent to the entrance for easy vehicle movement.
Open-plan living space with traditional Kerala decor, seamlessly connected to the central courtyard via sliding doors. Vastu-aligned facing east for positive energy.
Modular kitchen designed with efficient layout and natural lighting from adjacent courtyard. Incorporates local materials.
Spacious ensuite bathroom with ample storage and water features for relaxation, following Vastu principles for health and cleanliness.
Lounge-like bedroom designed as a bachelor pad that doubles as a study area. Features a private balcony with views of the courtyard.

openings.description: Large door opening aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Automated door for efficient access to the two-car garage.
Sliding glass door connecting living room to central courtyard, ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Large window for ample daylight, as per Vastu guidelines.

courtyard.description: Central open-air space with tiled flooring, surrounded by living spaces. Features a water fountain and native plants to promote positive energy.

rooms.description: Ensuite bedroom with built-in wardrobes and a private balcony overlooking the courtyard. Decorated in traditional Kerala style.
Multipurpose room serving as study and relaxation area, equipped with modern amenities while retaining traditional Kerala aesthetic.

openings.description: Window offering unobstructed view of the courtyard and morning light.
Door connecting study with the bedroom for a seamless living space.

balcony.description: Private balcony attached to the bedroom, offering views of the courtyard and a peaceful environment.
